LanguageData.Mousekin_WortLager.label: Mousekin lager wort
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortLager.description: A cloudy mixture of Mouse-ear barley, hops, water and yeast, ready to be fermented into Mousekin Lager.
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortMead.label: Mousekin mead must
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortMead.description: A mixture of Mousekin Honey, water and yeast, ready to be fermented into Mousekin Mead.
